title: Riot is coming to PAX AUS

replies.body: Neato! I can't wait to mingle with all my favourite league of legends personalities!
You like salt on your cake don't you buddy
Can you come to Auckland Armageddon too pretty please?! It's close enough and almost the same time
yes please! im in auckland as well and would love to see you guys coming here!
Yesss come to Auckland geddon, I'm already cosplaying Miss Fortune

So annoyed I missed out seeing the gang! 

I remember the 2013 PAX vs RIOT game.
aww, thats upsetting {{sticker:sg-soraka}}  its in Melbourne and im in Sydney
We're driving down :p don't let a lil travel stop you!
NO PAX SKIN CHEAP SKATE RIOT
"We're celebrating early by advertising tickets LMAO pay to see us... oh also we're doing like a stream for you plebs who can't afford to go to Melbourne, might give you some prizes or sommin"
